CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Billing", BillingAddressType__c + ',' + BillingStreet + ',' + BillingNumber__c + ',' + BillingNeighborhood__c + ',' + BillingPostalCode + ',' + BillingCity + ',' + BillingState, ShippingAddressType__c + ',' + ShippingStreet + ',' + ShippingNumber__c + ',' + ShippingNeighborhood__c + ',' + ShippingPostalCode + ',' + ShippingCity + ',' + ShippingState)
CustomField.label: Endere√ßo Completo
